response.original_title: Historikoa: Chill Mafiaren Azken Kontzertuaren Historia Erreala
response.overview: Although it's been a few months since the artistic collective that shook the foundations of the Basque music scene said goodbye, Chill Mafia's legacy is eternal, and now they've given us a new and highly original piece of content: a film in which they recount what led them to the decision to hold their massive final concert at the BEC to close their chapter together.  After the unexpected appearance of the Angel of Aralar, Kiliki Frexko is entrusted with a divine mission: to save the Basque Country by organizing a gigantic concert. As a blind believer, he assembles the entire Chill Mafia crew to put on the biggest show of the century. But between technical difficulties and surreal situations, the road to the stage won't be easy. A madcap comedy where music, miracles, and chaos go hand in hand.
response.title: Historikoa: Chill Mafiaren Azken Kontzertuaren Historia Erreala

titles.title: Histórico. La historia real del último concierto de Chill Mafia
